title: Tensi
text:
Hortensio Fernández Extravis, also known as Tensi, was a Spanish former <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who played as a <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">centre-back</a>. He played for 14 years for <a href="Real%20Oviedo">Real Oviedo</a>.
He is the third most capped player has worn the shirt of <a href="Real%20Oviedo">Oviedo</a>. Tensi also captained the club for many years.
